message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with the design of an adaptive power allocation scheme for a non-orthogonal multiple access (NOMA) system with hybrid automatic repeat request with chase combining (HARQ-CC) enabled, under strict outage constraints of users. This involves analyzing the outage probability of each user, formulating an average power minimization problem, and solving it using a successive convex approximation based algorithm. These topics are related to information theory (cs.IT), network infrastructure (cs.NI), control systems (cs.SY), multimedia (cs.MM), and game theory (cs.GT).
